comment.author: 51487922@N05
comment._content:
The Lake Macquarie & District Historical Society hold an original of this photograph, the caption reads as follows;

Roadside erosion is also a serious problem. Gully checks have been used to satbilise a bad gully and thus protect the Sturt Highway near Wagga Wagga. Advise on soil conservation is freely available from local Conservation Offices or the Secretary, Department of Conservation, Sydney.
